attaque.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

carte.ability: Each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it has no Weakness.

attaque.description: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.
Heal all damage from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.
If Shelmet is in play, search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

This Pokémon can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.
Draw 2 cards.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Leaf Wallop attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Move all Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

carte.ability: Once during your turn, after you flip any coins for an attack, you may ignore all effects of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again. You can't use more than 1 Victory Star Ability each turn.

attaque.description: If you have 4 or fewer Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.
The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Before doing damage, discard a Pokémon Tool card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.
The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Does 20 damage times the number of your Pokémon that have the Round attack.
Does 30 damage times the number of your Pokémon that have the Round attack.
Discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

carte.ability: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, reduce that damage by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attaque.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. If either of them is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Does 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

carte.ability: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attaque.description: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Does 20 more damage if you have any Lightning Pokémon on your Bench.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

carte.ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Lightning Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attaque.description: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

carte.ability: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attaque.description: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

carte.ability: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attaque.description: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

carte.ability: This Pokémon gets +20 HP for each Fighting Energy attached to it.

carte.ability: Each player can't play any Pokémon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Pokémon.

carte.description: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Tirtouga you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.
Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Archen you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.
Shuffle 3 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile back into your deck.
